messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=eee062ef2f11 ***

build: update .hgignore

R=golang-dev, dsymonds, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5451073

It'd be a better idea to manually maintain index.yaml (after stripping
out the autogenerated comments that the dev_appserver inserts).
Indexes aren't free on App Engine, and we won't need to add them very
often.

Dropped index.yaml

On 2 December 2011 16:13, David Symonds <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:
> It'd be a better idea to manually maintain index.yaml (after stripping
> out the autogenerated comments that the dev_appserver inserts).
> Indexes aren't free on App Engine, and we won't need to add them very
> often.
